page.title: 06POSTLIP HALL - Pt.2
page.content: There are 8 families living in P.H. at the moment and each family has to have one room which is at least 24feet square.The grounds are mainly parkland with a watergarden. There is a pond. Trout used to be bred,however,poachers took most of the fish. They look after the grounds themselves. They do not employ servants,though they used to. Each family has a plot in the vege- table garden. Families take turns to make and mend though all families are expected tobe in the garden each m'th. Sometimes the grounds are open to the public.The tythe barn is used for barn dances and butterfly festivals. There are lots of children -all young. The families do not sell their produce to make money.The chapel is said to be haunted.On one occasion the skeleton of a baby was found but nobody knew how it got there. (4)
